thread.section_title: Vanityfragrance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vanityfragrance | vanityfragrance.com
thread.title: Emma Campbell

author: Emma Campbell
title: Emma Campbell
text: Everything was alright. I was glad that the shipment came in a day prior to the date initially stated. The order was well packaged with lots of bubble wrap for extra protection. Received two cologne samples though not my favorites but a plus for the thought of it. This was a good deal all in all. They seem to have very low prices on a lot of good colognes. Last but not least, yes, I would recommend them especially if you are looking for good bargains.
